publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1645 Allan Wilson: Culture and Recreation Bill - UK Legislation—That the Parliament endorses the principle of gaining efficiency and effectiveness in relation to public bodies by means of structural change to the Film Council and to Resource: The Council for Museums, Archives and Libraries, as set out in the Culture and Recreation Bill; also endorses the provision of a simplified procedure for the making of parks regulations for application in Scotland, and agrees that the relevant provisions to achieve these ends in the Bill should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Mr Sam Galbraith*
